an3.100:1.1: Yo → yo kho (sya-all, km); yo ca kho (mr)
an3.100:4.1: loṇakapallaṁ → loṇaphalaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | udakamallake → udakakapallake (mr)
an3.100:4.3: taṁ parittaṁ udakaṁ → udakamallake udakaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an3.100:4.12: loṇakapallena loṇo na assa apeyyo”ti → loṇaṁ nevassa appeyyoti (bj); loṇaphalena loṇo assa apeyyoti (sya-all, pts1ed)
